properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters OF Southwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 9 at 4:49PM AST until February 10 at 8:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...Rough and hazardous marine conditions will prevail during the
next few days...

.A strong surface high pressure across the central Atlantic will
yield a fresh to locally strong easterly wind flow across the
regional waters, creating hazardous marine conditions through at
least late Monday night.

* WHAT...Seas between 3 to 5 feet with occasional seas up to 7
feet. East winds between 20 to 25 knots with higher gusts.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of Southwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM AST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM AST MONDAY
